message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you an exclusive opportunity to purchase this high-end product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to let it go for $9500. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the exclusivity of the product, but I need to stay within my budget. I am willing to pay $8000 for the product.
